alert.note: Alert for Dallam (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 09 at 8:50PM CDT until September 09 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Cimarron County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... Northwestern Dallam County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 945 PM CDT. * At 850 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles north of Felt, or 16 miles west of Boise City, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Felt and Wheeless. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
